title: How to downgrade from Android 13 Beta 2 back to Android 12 on Google Pixel [Video]
content:
You might have slapped the Android 13 Developer Preview or recent Beta 2 update on your Google Pixel and are missing out on a few things or not having the best experience. Luckily, you can downgrade your Android 13 build back to a stable version of Android 12 if you encounter any major problems or just don’t like the current incarnation.

more…

The post How to downgrade from Android 13 Beta 2 back to Android 12 on Google Pixel [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: If you are having problems, you might want to downgrade from the Android 13 Beta to a stable Android 12 build, this is how to do it.
